name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior IP Engineer with 13+ years of experience in network engineering, specializing in **Routing**, **Switching**, **Firewalls**, and **Automation**. Proficient in industry-standard tools such as **Ansible**, **CISCO**, **Juniper**, **Checkpoint**, and **Fortinet**; possesses active **CCNA** and **JNCIA** certifications. Strong technical problem-solving abilities, with a focus on developing reliable, secure and scalable network solutions. Demonstrated experience in **IPv6** and **5G** technologies enhances operational efficiency and promotes seamless connectivity.

Also skilled in **Python** and **Bash** for automation and scripting tasks, ensuring streamlined processes and system improvements. My background includes delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial industries, with hands-on expertise using frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Knowledgeable in compliance-driven development aligned with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, and have experience in MLOps with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
